Test Name: Drug of Abuse Screen 5 (Chain of Custody, Meconium)
Purpose: To detect and quantify drugs of abuse in meconium specimens, ensuring accurate, CLIA-compliant results for chain-of-custody testing.
Container: Clearly labeled meconium specimen container with chain-of-custody documentation
Equipment: Drug of Abuse Screening Kit and analyzers for drug screening (e.g., GC-MS or LC-MS/MS)
